What was the last Canadian NHL team to make it to the 'Stanley Cup Finals'?

What are the colors of France's flag?

Which country has the only national flag in the world that is neither rectangular nor square shaped?

Who is the god of war?
Which titan is forced to carry the heavens upon his shoulders?
Who is the goddess of the hunt, wilderness, animals, chastity, and childbirth?

column1: Anything below this area will not be processed by the TriviaApp

column2: SUPPORT IMAGES
Visual timer bar
Display currently loaded file name
Ability to read game file from URL
Store previously loaded game files in localStorage (re-uploading overrides localStorage item)
Configurable rules displayed on splash screen
On question screen, Ctrl+Space advances to next step (ie. Show Answer/Back to Questions) -- gives more screen real estate for image/video related questions
Implement horizontal scrollable scoreboard peek to allow for longer team names
Implement admin screen (Ctrl+A to invoke slide-down screen)
Admin Screen: Print screen for final score (file name is based on VTF date)
Admin Screen: Manually override team scores (in case of accidental input)
Admin Screen: Display/export final score stats (which teams got which questions right) and output as CSV (file name is based on VTF date)
Audio clip available on final screen which plays closing song (defined by VTF format)
When opening a question that was already scored, the teams that scored points from it before should already be highlighted (for when we miss a team)
Themes: Game of thrones, sci-fi
Guess song/artist from two lines of lyrics.
Image/Video based questions
Most categories were catered to younger audience. Maybe specialized category for older members of audience, like '80s pop culture?

Need to be more clear what answers are considered acceptable before answer is revealed. ie. Jay Z's full name requires middle name inclusion or is first name/last name sufficient? (anticipate questions like this and consider if we need halfAllowed)
How important is spelling? Is it ok if it's phonetically correct? Need to be consistent for all questions
Some questions were too difficult for their point value. Could have a +/- for answers like "be within 3 years of the answer"
REVISE ANSWER
column3: How many people currently work at Veeva?
